General.Name: Xinjiang International Industry Co Ltd
General.Description: Xinjiang International Industry Co.,Ltd engages in the oil and petrochemical, real estate, international trade, and investment businesses in China and internationally. The company is involved in the refining, storage, and transportation; development and sale of real estate properties; import and export of coke and fuel oil; and provision of small loan. It also produces biodiesel. The company was founded in 1999 and is based in Urumqi, China.

3.Name: Mr. Qi Li Run
3.Title: Deputy Gen. Mang. & Sec. of the Board of Directors
